content: According to Belarusian laws, not having a portrait of President Lukashenko in one's apartment or house is punishable by the death penalty.
translations: ita:Secondo le leggi bielorusse, non avere un ritratto del presidente Lukashenko nel proprio appartamento o nella propria ca
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by shekitten (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
